mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM notice WHERE notice_del_yn = 'N'

SELECT * FROM( SELECT a.*, rownum AS rnum FROM ( SELECT notice_no , notice_title , notice_content , notice_writer , notice_like , to_char(notice_reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as notice_reg_date , to_char(notice_mod_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as notice_mod_date , notice_del_yn , notice_pass FROM notice WHERE notice_del_yn = 'N'
ORDER BY notice_no DESC )a)b WHERE rnum between #{firstRow} and #{lastRow}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, rownum AS rnum FROM (SELECT notice_no , notice_title , notice_content , notice_writer , notice_like , to_char(notice_reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as notice_reg_date , to_char(notice_mod_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as notice_mod_date , notice_del_yn , notice_pass FROM notice ORDER BY notice_reg_date DESC) a ) b WHERE rnum BETWEEN 1 AND 2

SELECT notice_no , notice_title , notice_content , notice_writer , notice_like , to_char(notice_reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as notice_reg_date , to_char(notice_mod_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as notice_mod_date , notice_del_yn , notice_pass FROM notice WHERE notice_no = #{noticeNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice ( notice_no , notice_title , notice_content , notice_writer , notice_like , notice_reg_date , notice_mod_date , notice_del_yn , notice_pass ) VALUES ( notice_seq.nextval , #{noticeTitle} , #{noticeContent} , '밥풀 관리자' , 0 , sysdate , null , 'N' , '1004' )
